title: 《紅樓夢》Dream of the Red Chamber
author: 曹雪芹
description:
又稱《石頭記》，作者是曹雪芹。這部小說以賈寶玉、林黛玉、薛寶釵三人的愛情婚姻為主線，描繪了賈、王、史、薛四大家族的興衰，反映了封建社會的各種矛盾和腐朽。這部小說以寶黛愛情悲劇為主線，展現了封建社會的種種弊端。
該書通過豐富的人物形象和複雜的人際關係，展現了當時社會的風貌和人性的多面性。書中不僅有對貴族生活的細膩描繪，還有對封建社會種種弊端的深刻批評。《紅樓夢》以其獨特的藝術魅力和深邃的思想內容，成為中國乃至世界文學寶庫中的瑰寶。 Dream of the Red Chamber is a novel depicting the rise and fall of the four great families of Jia, Shi, Wang, and Xue. Centered around the tragic love story of Baoyu and Daiyu, it exposes various drawbacks of feudal society.

title: 中國古典四大名著 Four Great Classical Chinese Novels
author: 曹雪芹, 吳承恩, 羅貫中, 施耐庵
description:
1.《紅樓夢》：又稱《石頭記》，作者是曹雪芹。這部小說以賈寶玉、林黛玉、薛寶釵三人的愛情婚姻為主線，描繪了賈、王、史、薛四大家族的興衰，反映了封建社會的各種矛盾和腐朽。
 2. 《西遊記》：作者是吳承恩。小說以唐僧師徒四人西天取經的故事為線索，透過孫悟空、豬八戒、沙僧保護唐僧西行取經，途中歷經九九八十一難的故事，展現了豐富的想像力和深刻的寓意。
 3.《三國演義》：作者是羅貫中。這部小說以東漢末年到西晉初年之間的歷史為背景，透過曹操、劉備、孫權三個政治、軍事集團之間的矛盾和鬥爭，展現了那個時代的歷史風雲和英雄人物。
 4.《水滸傳》：作者是施耐庵。小說以宋江領導的樑山泊好漢起義為主線，描寫了108位好漢被逼上樑山，反抗貪腐官府的故事，反映了封建社會底層人民的反抗精神。

title: 《人間值得》 Human Life is Worth It
author: 茗溪 Ming Xi
description: 茗溪的《人間值得》是一本探討生活真諦的書，它以溫柔的筆觸，引領讀者進入一個充滿智慧與感悟的世界。作者結合自己的經歷，從自我認知、夢想追求、愛情體驗、幸福感悟和苦難應對等方面，為我們揭示了人生的意義。書中的文字如同潺潺流水，溫柔地洗滌我們的心靈，讓我們在認識到生活的真相後，依然保持對生活的熱愛和期待。 Human Life is Worth It is a work by Ming Xi, delving into the profound questions of life from aspects such as self, dreams, love, happiness, and suffering. The book guides readers through the muddy times of life, encouraging them to maintain the courage to love life even after recognizing the truth of life. With its gentle narrative, the book washes our souls like a murmuring stream, allowing us to keep loving and looking forward to life after understanding its reality。

title: 《從一到無窮大》 From One to Infinity
author: 喬治·伽莫夫  George Gamow
description: 本書以生動有趣的語言，深入淺出地介紹了數學、物理學、生物學及天文學的基本概念與前沿知識。從基礎的數學概念如大數與無窮大，到相對論、量子力學等深奧理論，再到生物遺傳、宇宙結構等宏大議題，通過一個個故事串聯，將複雜的科學概念變得易於理解，讓我們在享受閱讀樂趣的同時，拓寬科學視野，領略自然科學的魅力。無論是對科學感興趣的初學者還是有一定科學基礎的讀者，都能從中受益匪淺 。 The book introduces the basic concepts and cutting-edge knowledge of mathematics, physics, biology, and astronomy in a lively and interesting language. From basic mathematical concepts such as large numbers and infinity, to profound theories like relativity and quantum mechanics, and then to grand topics like biological genetics and the structure of the universe, it connects complex scientific concepts through stories, making them easy to understand. It allows us to enjoy the pleasure of reading while broadening our scientific horizons and appreciating the charm of natural science. Both beginners interested in science and readers with a certain scientific foundation can benefit greatly from it.

title: 《資治通鑑》 Zizhi Tongjian
author: 司馬光 Sima Guan
description: 《資治通鑑》是由北宋著名史學家司馬光（1019-1086）主編的一部編年體史書，全書共有294卷，約三百萬字。該書內容涵蓋了從周威烈王二十三年（公元前403年）開始，直到後周世宗顯德六年（959年），橫跨1362年的歷史。司馬光在劉攽、劉恕與范祖禹的協助下，歷時十九年完成了這部巨著。 《資治通鑑》以其廣泛的史料引用聞名，不僅涵蓋了十七史，還包括各種雜史、私人撰述等。據《四庫提要》記載，《資治通鑑》引用前人著作達322種，可見其取材之廣泛及史料價值之高。 宋神宗認為此書「鑑於往事，有資於治道」，因而賜名《資治通鑑》。此書與司馬遷的《史記》並列為中國史學的兩大鉅著，影響深遠。 Zizhi Tongjian, also known as Comprehensive Mirror to Aid in Government, is a monumental historical work compiled in the chronological style by the renowned historian Sima Guang (1019-1086) during the Northern Song Dynasty. The work consists of 294 volumes, totaling approximately three million characters. It covers a span of 1,362 years, beginning with the twenty-third year of King Weilie of Zhou (403 BCE) and ending with the sixth year of Emperor Xiande of the Later Zhou (959 CE). Sima Guang, with the assistance of Liu Ban, Liu Su, and Fan Zuyu, spent nineteen years completing this monumental work. Zizhi Tongjian is famous for its extensive use of sources, including not only the seventeen dynastic histories but also various miscellaneous histories and private writings by others. According to the Four Treasuries Catalogue Siku Tiyao, Zizhi Tongjian cites 322 different works, highlighting its comprehensive nature and high historical value.

title: 《資本論》 Capital: A Critique of Political Economy
author: 馬克思  Karl Marx
description: 《資本論》是馬克思的經典之作，這部作品被認為是政治經濟學的巔峰，深刻揭示了資本主義經濟的運作機制和內在矛盾。全書共分三卷，第一卷探討了資本的生產過程，第二卷研究了資本的流通過程，第三卷則是對資本主義生產總過程的分析。馬克思在這部著作中運用了辯證唯物主義和歷史唯物主義的方法論，闡述了資本主義經濟的發展規律，以及資本主義必然被社會主義所取代的歷史趨勢。《資本論》不僅是理論的研究，它還包含了對政治、法律、歷史、教育、道德、宗教等多個領域的深刻見解，是馬克思主義理論的寶庫。 Capital: A Critique of Political Economy is Karl Marx's seminal work, considered the pinnacle of political economy. It profoundly reveals the mechanisms and internal contradictions of the capitalist economy. The work is divided into three volumes, with the first volume exploring the production process of capital, the second volume examining the circulation process of capital, and the third volume analyzing the total process of capitalist production. Marx employs dialectical materialism and historical materialism in this work to elucidate the laws of development of the capitalist economy and the historical trend that capitalism will inevitably be replaced by socialism. Capital is not only a theoretical study; it also contains profound insights into various fields such as politics, law, history, education, morality, and religion, making it a treasure trove of Marxist theory.

title: 《毛澤東選集》第二版 The second edition of Selected Works of Mao Zedong collects
author: 毛澤東
description: 《毛澤東選集》第二版收錄了毛澤東在不同歷史時期的代表性著作，包括報告、演講、指示、信函等。這些文章涵蓋了中國共產黨領導的新民主主義革命時期的主要思想，反映了毛澤東對中國革命道路的選擇及其實踐。The second edition of Selected Works of Mao Zedong collects Mao Zedong's representative works in different historical periods, including reports, speeches, instructions, letters, etc. These articles cover the main ideas of the new democratic revolutionary period led by the Communist Party of China and reflect Mao Zedong’s choice of China’s revolutionary path and its practice.

title: 《真希望你也喜欢自己》 True Hope You Also Like Yourself
author: 房琪 Fang Qi
description: 《真希望你也喜欢自己》是房琪首部作品，也是她写给所有年轻人的“成长通关秘籍”。这本书记录了她个人成长的故事和经历，分享了她面对困难时的思考与选择。房琪在书中提出，每个人的成长道路虽然不同，但总会遇到相似的挑战和选择。她希望读者能从她的经历中找到共鸣，获得启发，找到属于自己的成长之路。房琪在书中强调，你不需要成为任何人，除了你自己。她认为，个人的成长和成功不应以成为别人为标准，而应以自我实现为目标。她鼓励年轻人要勇于面对挑战，不畏失败，坚持自己的热爱和追求。这本书还得到了杨天真、大冰、鲁豫、张含韵等人的推荐。他们认为房琪的故事和心法能给予正在成长的年轻人以指引和力量。房琪是一位知名的旅行内容创作者和主持人，她用视频和文字记录下自己走遍全国上百个城市的经历。她的作品以优美的文案和治愈人心的场景著称，她用自己的经历告诉我们，成功的背后是无数的艰辛和努力，她的“甜”都是用“苦”熬成的。 True Hope You Also Like Yourself is Fang Qi's debut work and also her growth pass secret book written for all young people. This book records her personal growth stories and experiences, sharing her thoughts and choices when facing difficulties. Fang Qi emphasizes in the book that although everyone's path of growth is different, we always encounter similar challenges and choices. She hopes that readers can find resonance in her experiences, gain inspiration, and find their own path to growth. Fang Qi states in the book, You don't need to be anyone, except yourself.She believes that personal growth and success should not be measured by becoming someone else but should aim for self-actualization. She encourages young people to face challenges bravely, not fear failure, and persist in their passions and pursuits. This book is also recommended by Yang Tianzhen, Da Bing, Lu Yu, Zhang Hanyun, and others. They believe that Fang Qi's stories and methods can guide and empower young people who are growing up. Fang Qi is a well-known travel content creator and host. She records her experiences of traveling to hundreds of cities across the country with videos and texts. Her works are known for their beautiful copywriting and healing scenes. With her own experience, she tells us that behind success are countless hardships and efforts; her sweetness is all refined from bitterness.

title: 《我從未如此眷戀人間》 I Have Never Been So Attached to the World
author: 史鐵生, Shi Tiesheng
description: 《我從未如此眷戀人間》这本书，通过史铁生和其他作家的文字，展现了他们对生活的热爱和对人性的深刻洞察。他们的故事和思想激励了无数人，他们的作品不仅是文学的享受，更是对生命的启迪和感悟。 Through the writings of Shi Tiesheng and other authors in I Have Never Been So Attached to the World, the book showcases their love for life and profound insight into human nature. Their stories and thoughts have inspired countless people. Their works are not only a literary enjoyment but also an inspiration and realization of life.
